data.snapshot: ETH opened near $4,470, slid from a $4,502 intraday high to a $3,846 low and currently trades around $4,028. Price sits modestly above short and mid SMAs with a neutral-to-bullish RSI, but volume shows no conviction.
chronology: Opened ~ $4,470 and spiked to an intraday high of $4,502.68.
Extended sell-off to an intraday low of $3,846.41.
Partial recovery into the $4,000 area; last prints $4,028.01 (-9.89% on the session).
Intraday maximum single-drop ~2.00%, indicating contained volatility.
Price currently above SMA8 ($4,013.36) and SMA21 ($3,965.20).
No volume spike or sweep detected during the move.
technicalReadout: Price: $4,028 — modestly above SMA8 ($4,013) and SMA21 ($3,965) — short-term bias lean bullish.
SMA8 > SMA21, signaling recent short-term upside momentum.
RSI 57.9 — neutral-to-mild bullish momentum, not overbought.
No volume spike -> move lacks strong participation/confirmation.
No sweep and lowerHighs=false -> no clear liquidity hunt or established downtrend.
Intraday max drop ~2% — volatility present but not extreme.

scenarios.title: Bull continuation
scenarios.text: Sustain above SMA8/21 with rising RSI and pick-up in volume; target re-test of $4,500 and resume uptrend toward prior highs.

scenarios.title: Short-term pullback
scenarios.text: Failure to hold SMA8 leads to slide toward SMA21 (~$3,965) and possible re-test of the session low near $3,846 if momentum deteriorates.

scenarios.title: Range-bound consolidation
scenarios.text: With no volume spike and mixed momentum, expect chop between roughly $3,950–$4,500 while market participants await a catalyst.

checklist: For demand zone longs: wait for a bullish reaction candle + above‑average buy volume; stop under sweep low.
For structured shorts: wait for a retest of resistance that fails and shows rejection volume; reduce size into expiries.
If price closes daily above key resistance with volume, reconsider bearish sizing.
Keep position sizing modest — the structure is still corrective and volatile.
